its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., probably its fiercest rival.

"I hope that information is wrong and that you will stand by your campaign promises to strengthen Social Security," read the letter from Sen. Bernie Sanders . I urge you once again to make it clear to the American people that under your watch we will not cut Social Security benefits, raise the retirement age or privatize this critical program.
